mapper.sql: select id, password, name, phone, age, sex, postcode, basic_addr, detail_addr, point, TO_CHAR(REG_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DATE from userinfo
mapper.insert: insert into userinfo(id, password, name, phone, age, sex, postcode, basic_addr, detail_addr, point) values (#{ id }, #{ password }, #{ name }, #{ phone }, #{ age }, #{ sex }, #{ postcode }, #{ basicAddr }, #{ detailAddr }, #{ point })
mapper.select: where id = #{ id } and password = #{ password }
